bibl.title: The Asyut Project: Ninth Season of Fieldwork (2011).
bibl.note: Ancient necropolis of Asyut, Joint mission of Sohag University, Freie Universität Berlin and Johannes Gutenberg-Universität Mainz. See in part. pp. 209-233: Teodozja Rzeuska, The Pottery, Assyut 2011 [from the Second Dynasty until Ptolemaic Period]; - 234-235: Chiori Kitagawa, Animal remains [from the Tomb of the Dogs]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Jochem Kahl, Mahmoud El-Khadragy, Ursula Verhoeven, Mohamed Abdelrahiem, Michael van Elsbergen, Hisham Fahid, Andrea Kilian, Chiori Kitagawa, Teodozja Rzeuska & Monika Zöller-Engelhardt, The Asyut Project: Ninth Season of Fieldwork (2011).
Studien zur Altägyptischen Kultur 41 (2012) pp. 189-235, 32 figg. et pll. 20-21.

Ancient necropolis of Asyut, Joint mission of Sohag University, Freie Universität Berlin and Johannes Gutenberg-Universität Mainz. See in part. pp. 209-233: Teodozja Rzeuska, The Pottery, Assyut 2011 [from the Second Dynasty until Ptolemaic Period]; - 234-235: Chiori Kitagawa, Animal remains [from the Tomb of the Dogs]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
Kahl El-Khadragy Verhoeven Abdelrahiem van Elsbergen Fahid Kilian Kitagawa Rzeuska Zöller-Engelhardt
